thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Brian
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text: As with most car hires in NZ the car was a little old (but as described on website) but was reliable and didn't let us down. Customer service from pick up at Dunedin to drop off at Auckland was first class. When dropping off there wasn't that feeling they were looking for something to find in order to charge us extra. Would definitely use again.
